trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time a new file is created in the folder you specify.

trigger: New file matching search in folder
trigger_description: This trigger fires every time a new file whose filename or file contents contains the words you specify is added to the folder you specify

trigger: New file or folder shared with me
trigger_description: This trigger fires every time a new file or folder is shared with you

trigger: New file matching regex in folder
trigger_description: This trigger fires every time a new file whose filename matches the regular expression you specify is added to the folder you specify
